A SURVEY OF RADIO AND TELEVISION LISTENING
IN THE LAFAYETTE AREA
Conducted by
The Division of Educational Reference
in cooperation with
Radio Station WBAA
Lafayette, Indiana
(Financial assistance in this project was provided
through a grant from the National Association
of Educational Broadcasters)
by
Robert A. Dunlop and John von Szeliski
under the direction of
H. H. Remmers, Director, Division of Educational Reference
and
J. S. Miles, Director, Radio Station WBAA
June 1957
